text: the AWS activate program helps startups

really have to worry about running up

stack software engineer at wasio wasio
is a laundry on demand delivery company
you can place an order on your phone and
a driver will come pick it up and and
get it dry cleaned and washed and fold
and brought back to you within 24 hours
so several years before joining wasio
I'd been using the AWS activate program
in my own personal Enterprises and uh
when I joined on at wasio uh really
found a a good use case for Amazon web
services when you order with wasio you
place an order and it goes to our API
which is on ec2 instances and then
there's an algorithm that that decides
where that uh order is going to go uh
running on another cluster of ec2 then a
driver gets routed to that location and
it goes again to our ec2 instances and
the order process continues from there
the support staff at a has been great in
helping us migrate everything and just

general some of the benefits that wasio

hours so we can go over you know what
our proposed Solutions are with

we've seen a 90% reduction in costs and
